dict.acceptation: 地面，土地；基础；范围；阵地，战场；
把…放在地上；在…的基础树立上；交给…基本知识；使…受初步训练；

sent.orig: This paper roundly analyzed the classic single airport ground-delay policy(GDP) model and multi-airport ground-delay policy(GDP) mode.
sent.trans: 系统地分析了单机场和多机场地面等待策略GDP(Ground-Delay Policy)经典模型。

sent.orig: While Henry was a Ground, he was not at all like his family.
sent.trans: 尽管Henry是Ground家族的一个成员，他与他的家人毫无相似之处。

sent.orig: Compare earth, ground, floor and soil.
sent.trans: 将earth、 ground、 floor、 soil这几个词作一比较。

sent.orig: Additionally there are ground-to-air, ground-to-ground, air-to-ground and air-to-air missiles, etc.
sent.trans: 另外，还有地对空导弹、地对地导弹、空对地导弹、空对空导弹等。

sent.orig: Ground settlement may accompany pipe jacking for complicated reasons, such as ground disturbance and ground loss.
sent.trans: 顶管在顶进过程中，产生地层扰动和地层损失，从而导致地面沉降。
